Group data

Source: R/data_aggregation.R
group_data.Rd

Group data

group_data(raw_data, grouping_paras = c("lci_method", "model", "process",
  "unit"), grouping_function = "sum")

Arguments

raw_data

as retrieved by function import_rawdata()
grouping_paras

cleaned column names used for grouping. (default: c("lci_method", "model", "process", "unit"))
grouping_function

R function used for grouping (default: "sum")

Value

aggregated data according

Examples

umberto7_csv_dir <- system.file("extdata/umberto-nxt_v7.1.0.13.503",
package = "kwb.umberto")
umberto7_rawdata <- kwb.umberto::import_rawdata(csv_dir = umberto7_csv_dir)
#> [1] "Importing csv file 'C:/Users/mrustl.KWB/Documents/RProjects/kwb.umberto/inst/extdata/umberto-nxt_v7.1.0.13.503/Ref_High_C+high N.csv'"
#> Using ',' as decimal and '.' as grouping mark. Use read_delim() for more control.
#> Parsed with column specification:
#> cols(
#>   Project = col_character(),
#>   Model = col_character(),
#>   Net = col_character(),
#>   Timestamp = col_character(),
#>   Product = col_character(),
#>   `LCI Method` = col_character(),
#>   Phase = col_character(),
#>   Process = col_character(),
#>   `Material Type` = col_character(),
#>   Material = col_character(),
#>   Quantity = col_double(),
#>   Unit = col_character()
#> )

#> 2 cumulative energy demand - fo~ 0a_Ref_~ T12: Electricity ~ MJ-Eq       30204.
#> 3 cumulative energy demand - fo~ 0a_Ref_~ T13: FeCl3         MJ-Eq       17734.

#> 6 cumulative energy demand - fo~ 0a_Ref_~ T21: Mono-Inciner~ MJ-Eq        5687.

umberto10_csv_dir <- system.file("extdata/umberto-lca+_v10.1.0.3.146",
package = "kwb.umberto")
umberto10_rawdata <- kwb.umberto::import_rawdata(csv_dir = umberto10_csv_dir)
#> [1] "Importing csv file 'C:/Users/mrustl.KWB/Documents/RProjects/kwb.umberto/inst/extdata/umberto-lca+_v10.1.0.3.146/smartech2_model-v0.1.0_input-v0.3.1.csv'"
#> Using ',' as decimal and '.' as grouping mark. Use read_delim() for more control.
#> Parsed with column specification:
#> cols(
#>   Project = col_character(),
#>   Model = col_character(),
#>   Net = col_character(),
#>   Timestamp = col_character(),
#>   Product = col_character(),
#>   `Product Name` = col_character(),
#>   `Product Arrow` = col_character(),
#>   `Product Flow Amount` = col_character(),
#>   `LCI Method` = col_character(),
#>   Phase = col_character(),
#>   Process = col_character(),
#>   `Material Type` = col_character(),
#>   Material = col_character(),
#>   Quantity = col_double(),
#>   Unit = col_character()
#> )
umberto10_data_grouped <- kwb.umberto::group_data(umberto10_rawdata)
head(umberto10_data_grouped)
#> # A tibble: 6 x 5
#> # Groups:   lci_method, model, process [6]
#>   lci_method                        model     process        unit  quantity_sum
#>   <chr>                             <chr>     <chr>          <chr>        <dbl>

#> 2 cumulative energy demand - fossi~ 0_Refere~ T15: Sludge t~ MJ-Eq        1763.
#> 3 cumulative energy demand - fossi~ 0_Refere~ T21: fertiliz~ MJ-Eq    -7072323.
#> 4 cumulative energy demand - fossi~ 0_Refere~ T31: Electric~ MJ-Eq   -13154124.
#> 5 cumulative energy demand - fossi~ 0_Refere~ T4: Electrici~ MJ-Eq   181431756.
#> 6 cumulative energy demand - nucle~ 0_Refere~ T14: Polymer   MJ-Eq      296075.
